languages.text: "Может, эта сомнительная операция выведет нас на преступников покрупнее. Тратить время на разборки обычных паразитов было бы зазорно".
languages.translation_comment:
During Jae's first quest (to retrieve her stolen cargo on Footfall).
Argenta: "Is aiding a smuggler an endeavour worthy of a Rogue Trader?"

traits.locale_text: "Может, эта сомнительная операция выведет нас на преступников покрупнее. Тратить время на разборки обычных паразитов было бы зазорно".

languages.text: "Perhaps this unsavoury operation will put us on the trail of more serious criminals. It wouldn't do for us to waste time on squabbles between common parasites."
languages.translation_comment:
During Jae's first quest (to retrieve her stolen cargo on Footfall).
Argenta: "Is aiding a smuggler an endeavour worthy of a Rogue Trader?"
languages.original_text: "Может, эта сомнительная операция выведет нас на преступников покрупнее. Тратить время на разборки обычных паразитов было бы зазорно".

traits.locale_text: "Perhaps this unsavoury operation will put us on the trail of more serious criminals. It wouldn't do for us to waste time on squabbles between common parasites."
"Perhaps this unsavoury operation will put us on the trail of more serious criminals. It wouldn't do for us to waste time on squabbles between common parasites."
"Perhaps this unsavoury operation will put us on the trail of more serious criminals. It wouldn't do for us to waste time on squabbles between common parasites."
"Perhaps this unsavoury operation will put us on the trail of more serious criminals. It wouldn't do for us to waste time on squabbles between common parasites."
"Perhaps this unsavoury operation will put us on the trail of more serious criminals. It wouldn't do for us to waste time on squabbles between common parasites."
"Perhaps this unsavoury operation will put us on the trail of more serious criminals. It wouldn't do for us to waste time on squabbles between common parasites."

languages.text: 「今回の不愉快な作戦が、もっと重大な犯罪者の手がかりにつながるといいんだがな。下等な寄生虫どものいざこざに時間を無駄にするわけにはいかない」
languages.original_text: "Perhaps this unsavoury operation will put us on the trail of more serious criminals. It wouldn't do for us to waste time on squabbles between common parasites."

traits.locale_text: 「今回の不愉快な作戦が、もっと重大な犯罪者の手がかりにつながるといいんだがな。下等な寄生虫どものいざこざに時間を無駄にするわけにはいかない」

languages.text: "Vielleicht kommen wir dank dieser abstoßenden Operation noch gefährlicheren Verbrechern auf die Schliche. Wir dürfen keine Zeit auf Streitereien zwischen gewöhnlichen Parasiten vergeuden."
languages.original_text: "Perhaps this unsavoury operation will put us on the trail of more serious criminals. It wouldn't do for us to waste time on squabbles between common parasites."

traits.locale_text: "Vielleicht kommen wir dank dieser abstoßenden Operation noch gefährlicheren Verbrechern auf die Schliche. Wir dürfen keine Zeit auf Streitereien zwischen gewöhnlichen Parasiten vergeuden."

languages.text: « Cette opération dégradante nous mettra peut-être sur la piste de criminels plus importants. Nous n'avons pas de temps à perdre avec des querelles entre de vulgaires parasites. »
languages.original_text: "Perhaps this unsavoury operation will put us on the trail of more serious criminals. It wouldn't do for us to waste time on squabbles between common parasites."

traits.locale_text: « Cette opération dégradante nous mettra peut-être sur la piste de criminels plus importants. Nous n'avons pas de temps à perdre avec des querelles entre de vulgaires parasites. »

languages.text: «Puede que esta desagradable operación nos permita seguir el rastro de criminales más serios. No sería práctico perder tiempo con conflictos entre vulgares parásitos».
languages.original_text: "Perhaps this unsavoury operation will put us on the trail of more serious criminals. It wouldn't do for us to waste time on squabbles between common parasites."

traits.locale_text: «Puede que esta desagradable operación nos permita seguir el rastro de criminales más serios. No sería práctico perder tiempo con conflictos entre vulgares parásitos».

languages.text: “说不定，这场令人厌恶的行动可以帮助我们追查到更加声名狼藉的罪犯。若非如此，这便不过是一群寄生虫之间的争斗，我们真的不该把时间浪费在这上面。”
languages.original_text: "Perhaps this unsavoury operation will put us on the trail of more serious criminals. It wouldn't do for us to waste time on squabbles between common parasites."

traits.locale_text: “说不定，这场令人厌恶的行动可以帮助我们追查到更加声名狼藉的罪犯。若非如此，这便不过是一群寄生虫之间的争斗，我们真的不该把时间浪费在这上面。”

languages.text: "Belki de bu nahoş operasyon, bizi daha çok suçluya götürür. Alçak asalakların çekişmeleriyle vakit kaybetmek hiçbir işimize yaramaz."
languages.original_text: "Perhaps this unsavoury operation will put us on the trail of more serious criminals. It wouldn't do for us to waste time on squabbles between common parasites."

traits.locale_text: "Belki de bu nahoş operasyon, bizi daha çok suçluya götürecek. Alçak asalakların çekişmeleriyle vakit kaybetmek hiçbir işimize yaramaz."

languages.original_text: "Perhaps this unsavoury operation will put us on the trail of more serious criminals. It wouldn't do for us to waste time on squabbles between common parasites."
